A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I created a RT account just to rate this movie. I think newcomers to the franchise love this movie\, but long-time fans who have been with it from the beginning will have a harder time. All movies establish their own universe\, and laws of physics. This movie is a reboot/reinvention. It violates almost every law\, and even defies common sense. The story/plot is ridiculously weak\, the acting is horrible\, the dialogue is awkward and riddled with cliche after cliche. We're expected to believe/accept completely unbelievable situations.  The potential of the movie is completely wasted. Characters are given skills and/or abilities they never trained for or that we've never witnessed in the franchise. They've turned this franchise into a Marvels super hero flick where the force sensitive characters can do anything on a whim.
